content: Without giving away too much detail, the ending of the movie is bittersweet and unexpected, and it does leave the audience with mixed emotions. The characters' reactions are heartfelt, and viewers get a sense of closure and resolution regarding the storyline. Some people may feel satisfied with the ending, while others may feel disappointed or left with unanswered questions. However, overall, the twist provides a fitting conclusion to the movie's plot, and it adds to the movie's memorable nature.
